keyword.name: initial_size
keyword.label: Trust region initial size (relative to bounds)

keyword.name: contract_threshold
keyword.label: Shrink trust region if trust region ratio is below this value

keyword.name: expand_threshold
keyword.label: Expand trust region if trust region ratio is above this value

keyword.name: id_method
keyword.label: Method set identifier
keyword.default: strategy use of last method parsed

keyword.label: Pointer to the global model specification

keyword.label: Pointer to the global method specification

keyword.label: Pointer to the local model specification

keyword.label: Pointer to the local method specification

keyword.name: method_name

keyword.label: Model pointer
keyword.default: method use of last model parsed (or use of default model if none parsed)

keyword.name: method_pointer
keyword.label: Identification of a sub-method by pointer to a separate specification block

keyword.name: model_pointer
keyword.label: Identification of model by pointer
keyword.default: method use of last model parsed (or use of default model if none parsed)

keyword.name: single

keyword.default: N/A ( single if no model specification)

keyword.label: Interface Set Pointer
keyword.default: model use of last interface parsed

keyword.name: solution_level_control
keyword.label: Simulation Solution Level Control Variable
keyword.default: use of single default solution level

keyword.label: Relative Simulation Cost Factors for Solution Levels

keyword.name: support_layers
keyword.label: Layers of Support for Local Basis Function

keyword.name: import_build_points_file
keyword.label: File Import of Samples for Global Approximation Builds
keyword.default: no point import from a file

keyword.name: export_approx_points_file
keyword.label: File Export of Global Approximation-Based Sample Results
keyword.default: no point export to a file

keyword.name: primary_variable_mapping
keyword.label: Primary Variable Mappings
keyword.default: default variable insertions based on variable type

keyword.name: secondary_variable_mapping
keyword.label: Secondary Variable Mappings
keyword.default: primary mappings into sub-model variables are value-based

keyword.name: primary_response_mapping
keyword.label: Primary Response Mappings
keyword.default: no sub-iterator contribution to primary functions

keyword.name: secondary_response_mapping
keyword.label: Secondary Response Mappings
keyword.default: no sub-iterator contribution to secondary functions

keyword.name: variables_pointer
keyword.label: Variables Pointer
keyword.default: model use of last variables parsed

keyword.name: responses_pointer
keyword.label: Responses Pointer
keyword.default: model use of last responses parsed

keyword.name: active
keyword.label: Active variables
keyword.default: Infer from response or method specification

keyword.name: mixed
keyword.label: mixed
keyword.default: relaxed (branch and bound), mixed (all other methods)

keyword.name: num_intervals
keyword.label: number of intervals defined for each continuous interval variable
keyword.default: Equal apportionment of intervals among variables

keyword.name: interval_probabilities
keyword.label: basic probability assignments per continuous interval
keyword.default: Equal probability assignments for each interval (1/num_intervals[i])

keyword.label: Number of intervals defined for each interval variable
keyword.default: Equal apportionment of intervals among variables

keyword.name: interval_probabilities
keyword.label: Basic probability assignments per interval
keyword.default: Equal probability assignments for each interval (1/num_intervals[i])

keyword.default: no discrete uncertain set integer variables
